talks.title: The Future of Artificial Intelligence
talks.description: A deep dive into the latest advancements in AI and what to expect in the coming years.

talks.title: Building Scalable Web Applications
talks.description: Learn the best practices for building web applications that can handle millions of users.

talks.title: Cybersecurity in a Post-Quantum World
talks.description: An overview of the threats and opportunities that quantum computing brings to cybersecurity.

talks.title: The Rise of Serverless Computing
talks.description: A practical guide to building and deploying serverless applications.

talks.title: Data Science for Social Good
talks.description: Discover how data science is being used to address some of the world's most pressing social challenges.

talks.title: The Ethics of AI
talks.description: A discussion on the ethical implications of artificial intelligence and how we can ensure it is used for the benefit of humanity.
